Beaumont.Ford Arena:
The Ford Arena is a 9,737-seat multi-purpose arena in Beaumont, Texas, USA. It is part of a larger suburban municipal complex called Ford Park.


== Tenants ==


=== Current ===

Ford Arena is the current Beaumont home of the Ringling Brothers and Barnum and Bailey Circus, Disney on Ice, and Stars on Ice.


=== Former ===
Ford Arena was most recently home to Oxford City FC of Texas (formerly the Texas Strikers) of the Major Arena Soccer League.
